com.cognifide.qa.bb.mapper.field

Class ScopedPageObjectProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cognifide.qa.bb.mapper.field.ScopedPageObjectProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FieldProvider

    public class ScopedPageObjectProvider
extends Object
implements FieldProvider
    This provider produces values for PageObject's fields that are annotated with one of the Find annotations. It tracks the context in which the objects are created so that their own child objects can reference their parent's creation context.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScopedPageObjectProvider()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean accepts(Field field)
      PageObjectInjectorListener calls this method to check if the provider is able to handle currently injected field.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScopedPageObjectProvider

        public ScopedPageObjectProvider()

    • Method Detail

      • accepts

        public boolean accepts(Field field)
        PageObjectInjectorListener calls this method to check if the provider is able to handle currently injected field.

        ScopedPageObjectProvider handles fields that:

        • come from classes that are annotated with PageObject annotation,
        • have one of the Find annotations.
        Specified by:
        accepts in interface FieldProvider
        Parameters:
        field - represents field in page object.
        Returns:
        true if provider is able to handle currently injected field.

      • provideValue

        public Optional<Object> provideValue(Object pageObject,
                                     Field field,
                                     PageObjectContext context)
        This method produces value for the field. It constructs the context for the creation out of parent's context and the field's own frame info.
        Specified by:
        provideValue in interface FieldProvider
        Parameters:
        pageObject - This is the parent object of the injected field.
        field - Provider will generate value for this field.
        context - Provider might refer to frame path and locator factory while generating value for the field.
        Returns:
        Value for the injected field, as calculated by the provider.
